content: sweet little star is full of hopes dreams and a love for snuggly crochet gifts with a little imagination and a skein of magical yarn star is ready to whip up anything you could wish for in yarn form now you can stitch up your very own star complete with their favorite heart pattern ***suggested yarns*** you will need 1 skein or less of each color berroco worsted yarn 3 5 oz | 100 g 210 yds | 193 m a goldenrod #9743 b buttercup #9712 c pumpkin #9724 d wild cherry #9755 ***notions*** hooks size f 3 75 mm hook ***materials *** 1 bag of fiberfill scissors tapestry needle and/or doll needle *optional dark orange felt with sewing needle and thread or craft glue *
